kw.name: Then future skill should display home page and display message as "ระบบได้ส่งรหัส OTP ไปยังเบอร์โทรศัพท์"

kw.name: Wait until page contains element then verify text
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Page should have contained text 'ระบบได้ส่งรหัส OTP ไปยังเบอร์โทรศัพท์' but did not.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
